title: Tenchi Universe
resume: Tenchi Masaki may be a 17-year-old young man in rural Japan, but  little does he know how bad his day will be getting. When a space pirate  chased by a pair of Galaxy Police officers crash-lands at his  grandfather's temple, Tenchi is sucked into a new adventure that will  literally blast him off into outer space and beyond.
